recipes.db_mssql::install: Installs Microsoft SQL 2008 Enterprise Server with specified options

db_mssql/security_mode.display_name: What type of logins the server will accept.  Only Active Directory logins if set to 'Windows', mixed mode if set to 'SQL'
db_mssql/security_mode.description: What type of logins the server will accept.  Only Active Directory logins if set to 'Windows', mixed mode if set to 'SQL'
